Articles.Content:
The latest issue of Science magazine has papers from the Rosetta team.

I doubt many of you can see the link, but:

http://www.sciencemagazinedigital.org/sciencemagazine/23_january_2015?sub_id=y4pbr1RFOmf0&folio=395#pg116

You should be able to see these:

http://www.sciencemag.org/content/347/6220/aaa3905.abstract

http://www.sciencemag.org/content/347/6220/aaa1044.abstract
